info.title: API de ejemplo
info.description: Documentaci√≥n de la API de ejemplo

200.description: A list of areas with their associated categories

get.summary: Get inscriptions for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific inscription by ID.

post.description: Create a new inscription with the provided data

olympic_id.description: The ID of the Olympic event

errors.description: Detailed validation errors for each field that failed validation.

items.example: The legal tutor ci field is required.
The responsable email must be a valid email address.

errors.description: Detailed error message for internal server errors.

get.summary: Get areas for a specific olympiad
get.description: Returns the list of areas with their categories based on the olympiad ID.

parameters.name: course
parameters.description: Filter by course range (e.g., 4to Secundaria, 5to Secundaria)

errors.description: Detailed error message for bad requests.

post.summary: Access to responsable data with JWT token
post.description: Authenticate a responsable by CI and code, then generate a JWT token.

categories.description: List of categories associated with the area

Categories.title: Categories Model
Categories.description: This model represents the Categories table in the database.

id.description: The unique identifier for the category.

area_id.description: The ID of the area to which this category belongs.

range_course.description: An array representing the range of courses available in this category.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the category was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the category was last updated.

Competitors.title: Competitors Model
Competitors.description: Represents a Competitor in the system.

Inscriptions.title: Inscriptions Model
Inscriptions.description: Represents an inscription in the system.

id.description: The unique identifier for the inscription.

competitor_id.description: The ID of the competitor associated with the inscription.

olympiad_id.description: The ID of the Olympiad event associated with the inscription.

area_id.description: The ID of the area associated with the inscription.

category_id.description: The ID of the category associated with the inscription.

LegalTutors.title: Legal Tutors Model
LegalTutors.description: This model represents the Legal Tutors entity in the application.

id.description: The unique identifier for the legal tutor.

personal_data_id.description: The ID of the associated personal data.

OlympiadAreas.title: OlympiadAreas Model
OlympiadAreas.description: This model represents the relationship between Olympics, Areas, and Categories.

id.description: The unique identifier for the OlympiadAreas.

area_id.description: The area associated with this OlympiadAreas.

category_id.description: The category associated with this OlympiadAreas.

olympic_id.description: The olympic associated with this OlympiadAreas.

Olympiads.title: Olympiads Model
Olympiads.description: A model representing an Olympiads event.

id.description: The unique identifier of the Olympiads event.

title.description: The title of the Olympiads event.

description.description: A brief description of the Olympiads event.
description.example: This is a description of the Olympiads event.

price.description: The price associated with the Olympiads event.

status.description: The status of the Olympiads event (e.g., 'active', 'inactive').

publish.description: The publication status of the Olympiads event.

presentation.description: Details about the presentation of the Olympiads event.

requirements.description: The requirements for participating in the Olympiads event.

start_date.description: The start date of the Olympiads event.

end_date.description: The end date of the Olympiads event.

contacts.description: Contact information for the Olympiads event.

awards.description: Details about the awards available in the Olympiads event.

PersonalData.title: Personal Data Model
PersonalData.description: A model representing personal data of an individual.

id.description: The unique identifier for the personal data record.

ci.description: The identity card number of the individual.

ci_expedition.description: The date when the identity card was issued.

names.description: The first names of the individual.

last_names.description: The last names of the individual.

email.description: The email address of the individual.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the individual.

Responsables.title: Responsables Model
Responsables.description: This model represents the Responsables table in the database.

id.description: The unique identifier of the responsable

personal_data_id.description: The ID of the personal data associated with this responsable

code.description: A code or identifier for the responsable

Schools.title: Schools Model
Schools.description: A model representing a school with name, department, and province.

id.description: The unique identifier of the school

province.description: The province where the school is located

created_at.description: The timestamp when the school was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the school was last updated

Teachers.title: Teachers Model
Teachers.description: This model represents the teachers in the system.

id.description: The unique identifier for the teacher.

personal_data_id.description: The ID of the personal data associated with this teacher.
